item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (701 points | 524 comments)
2. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (81 points | 23 comments)
3. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (369 points | 116 comments)
4. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (117 points | 38 comments)
5. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (201 points | 118 comments)
6. How to manage oncall as an engineering manager? (29 points | 24 comments)
7. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (121 points | 45 comments)
8. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (229 points | 73 comments)
9. Scientific rigor proponents retract paper on benefits of scientific rigor (13 points | 3 comments)
10. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (94 points | 86 comments)
11. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (118 points | 122 comments)
12. Why I still blog after 15 years (349 points | 182 comments)
13. OpenAI Discusses Giving Altman 7% Stake in For-Profit Shift (36 points | 25 comments)
14. Google Zanzibar: Implementing the Check API and Expand API Using .NET (19 points | 1 comment)
15. Audio Masking (102 points | 16 comments)
16. Clara (YC S24) Is Hiring a Head of Growth ( | hide)
17. SQL Tips and Tricks (256 points | 124 comments)
18. ts-blank-space is a fast type-stripping compiler (29 points | 24 comments)
19. The Impact of Element Ordering on LM Agent Performance (29 points | 2 comments)
20. MI couple running out of time to prove they found Great Lakes' oldest shipwreck (27 points | 23 comments)
21. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (255 points | 90 comments)
22. The Simple Magic of Consistent Hashing (2011) (10 points | 1 comment)
23. Show HN: Fast and Exact Algorithm for Image Merging (78 points | 25 comments)
24. Optimizing Guile Scheme (135 points | 43 comments)
25. Show HN: King Thirteen: 2048 with chess pieces, in under 13 KB (115 points | 44 comments)
26. Capstone Disassembler Framework (58 points | 17 comments)
27. System Intiative is generally available (90 points | 60 comments)
28. Who is Marcellus Williams: Execution in Missouri despite evidence of innocence (223 points | 258 comments)
29. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (78 points | 42 comments)
30. Mira Murati leaves OpenAI (496 points | 357 comments)
